name: How can I help you? (Shumary)
description:
Hello and welcome to our new psycho-project. We had some problems with financing, but that should not be the problem for the patient, should that? Well, here you have an opportunity to talk with one of our special chatbots aimed to find any problem in your life bothering you and to fix, um, to treat it kindly. You can call it by the name Nelly and… or wait… hang on, we have something in here…

Directed by @Shumarie

Programmed by @Arsvarg

Written by @karpovame

Idea, translation and some art by Ray, proofreaded by Shumeikaaa

Music by @BrauerDmitry

Sound design by Марина Степаненко#0762

Concepted by everyone

LD49 entry!
